body: fwiw, I was able to compile and run tests successgully on macOS Sierra using 1.7.1 to bootstrap. Trying to use 1.4.3 to bootstrap resulted in similar looking errors, which I assume is due to these issues: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/16352#issuecomment-245982298. From the paths displayed in the traceback it looks like you're using 1.4 to compile. Have you tried setting GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP?
